```{r library-weather, include=FALSE}

library(here)

```

```{r load-weather-data, include = FALSE}

if(!exists("meteo_france")){
  if(!file.exists(here("data","meteo_france.rds"))){
    URL <- "https://zenodo.org/record/6536129/files/meteo_france.rds?download=1"
    meteo_france <- readRDS(url(URL))
    saveRDS(meteo_france,here("data","meteo_france.rds"))
  }
  else{
  meteo_france <- readRDS(here("data","meteo_france.rds"))
  }
}

```
